channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: This has been here for weeks now blocking entrance & exit of garages. Van coming in broken gate and dumping rubbish. Lock on gate broken also a council problem to fix, 28th September
item.description:
This has been here for weeks and nothing has been done about it. This is happening on council property where I pay service charges for this stuff to be cleaned up. I can’t access the garage that I also rent do to the dumped stuff in front of the gate.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Elmbridge Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves etc blocking drain, parking area inside Crouch Close, 28th September
item.description:
Please, can you help us. You have previously cleaned this area as your large street cleaning equipment can’t get in to the close. Once again, it’s really bad and leaves and bits from the huge tree block the drain. Not to mention that it looks pretty insightful - it’s a busy pavement too and all the dirt is carried in to cars and properties. Very grateful if you are able to clean the area, please. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbey Lane, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter, 28th September
item.description:
Mass of litter all over the place

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Approach, New Barnet, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal parking oldhill, 28th September
item.description:
Just one of many cars currently illegally parked on oldhill preventing safe and consistent flow of traffic. It’s constantly backed up because of how people park on the street please can the council do something about this

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Oldhill Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car, 28th September
item.description:
Car has been in same position for 2 months and is untaxed, opposite no.4 Maiden Erlegh Avenue causing difficulties accessing driveways. Car is a grey Ford Focus Reg OO03HCW
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Maiden Erlegh Avenue, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree requires pruning and path requires clearing and cleaning, 28th September
item.description:
The bottom of the trunk needs pruning. The path requires cleaning as it is full of small apples that pose a tripping hazard, along with litter buildup. The path is all stained.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eden Park Avenue, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken road, 28th September
item.description:
This road has subsided many times before and council tend to come along and patch it up. Over the last couple of weeks it ha dipped against very quickly and surface is all cracking up. There are a number of cars and cyclists that use this road including local school for cyclist proficiency. As the hole is on a bend it is also dangerous to cars as cannot see until too late

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brixham Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish in white plastic bag., 28th September
item.description:
Bag has been here for at least 2 weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clarence Road, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Despite cleaning a few weeks back neither the road was properly cleaned nor had the payment been sort since, 28th September
item.description:
After years of endless complaining would the council please ensure this end of roadway road both the street and pavement are cleaned properly and regularly. It’s a never ending battle! I have said many times there is no point in trying to clean the road before 2.30 pm as it’s jammed with cars.surely there are street cleaners working in the afternoon.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hawes Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Apparent dumped vehicle, 28th September
item.description:
The car has been in the road for several weeks. Not moved and window open. Appears to have been dumped

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hawes Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Zebra crossing across Fitzroy St near j/w Maple Street, 28th September
item.description:
Please could the LOOK LEFT / LOOK RIGHT road markings here be updated to LOOK BOTH WAYS to account for the contraflow cycle route (which perhaps postdates the installation of the zebra crossing). Photo to illustrate that vehicles now approach the zebra from both directions and not just LEFT as indicated.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fitzroy Street, Fitzrovia, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street cleaning, 28th September
item.description:
This stretch of Evering Road is used as main thoroughfare from station to high road . It would be good to have it regularly cleaned as people just drop their litter on top of the accumulating leaves .Swept into piles to make it easier for you to clean

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Evering Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven cycle surface, 28th September
item.description:
The surface of the cycle and pedestrian way between Lambs Ln and Mare St is dangerous for cyclists. There are multiple potholes, divots and gutters large enough to cause obstruction of cycle tyres.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lamb Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Car - Over 1 month blocking cycle lane, 28th September
item.description:
Smart car left at top of Eden park Road opposite majestic wines. Blocking cycle lane as cyclists would exit roundabout and veer into traffic. Previously reported 16 Aug 8032522 24 Aug 8066212 Car hasn’t moved in over 6 weeks - please kindly follow up on this. Dangerous position but keeps getting closed out / dismissed thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 130, South Eden Park Road, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
